Hi everyone. 

Will consider trades for EPDGs. 

Anyone saying I’ll take it gets Priority. Will consider offers, especially if buying more than 1.  PayPal friends or money order/cashiers check.

$76 Moran SGC 60
$27 Arellanes GAI 2
$27 Abstein SGC 30.  Very nice for grade  **HOLD**
$25 Becker PSA 2.

PM your email address for bigger scans.
